improvement: Refined the tool name and description to better highlight its capabilities and differentiate it from other similar tools. Emphasized the ability to analyze a given body of text and provide a clear categorization of sentiment.
description: Determine the sentiment of a given body of text, categorizing it as positive, negative, or neutral based on the presence and intensity of emotional language and tone. The analysis is typically performed using natural language processing (NLP) techniques and machine learning algorithms.
name: sentiment_analysis_service.sentiment_insight
